channel.title: Mod option
channel.description: hey, in my server on the rebort abuse button it has a mod option to mute for 48 hrs exept for some reason it is off. How do i turn it on?

item.title: Mod option
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Yes it’s an extra option that isn’t even needed. If you really want, click on that option then move to your run.bat window and look for it’s case id, then add the mute command in clickingmost.java under it’s case ID, but remember to change the command to actually mute them.

Read full topic

item.title: Mod option
item.dc:creator: @Get_Forgotten Get_Forgotten
item.description:
@Get_Forgotten wrote:

I’ve got a question about your question… Why do you need it… if the mod knows the persons name why not just put in the extra effort and type ::mute =/

Read full topic
